overview: At the doctor’s office, Emit is surrounded by cold and indifferent onlookers. He tries but fails to pay attention to the seemingly redundant questions being fired at him. Frustrated by this unsympathetic crowd, Emit seeks solace back at home. Yet, this offers little respite as Emit’s mind and body continue to deteriorate. As daily life becomes increasingly dysfunctional,  Emit finds himself struggling to reconcile the mismatch between his perception and reality.
title: Emit
